sect3.title: Apache2Handler
sect3.para: The PHP module has been renamed from php7_module to php_module.

sect3.title: Reflection
sect3.para: ReflectionClass::getConstants and ReflectionClass::getReflectionConstants results can be now filtered via a new parameter filter. Three new constants were added to be used with it:

sect3.title: Standard
sect3.para: The math functions abs, ceil, floor and round now properly heed the strict_types directive. Previously, they coerced the first argument even in strict type mode.

listitem.para: The ZipArchive::addGlob and ZipArchive::addPattern methods accept more values in the options array argument:

ZipArchive::addEmptyDir, ZipArchive::addFile and ZipArchive::addFromString methods have a new flags argument. This allows managing name encoding (ZipArchive::FL_ENC_*) and entry replacement (ZipArchive::FL_OVERWRITE).
ZipArchive::extractTo now restores the file modification time.
The CURL extension now requires at least libcurl 7.29.0.
The deprecated parameter version of curl_version has been removed.

sect3.title: Date and Time
sect3.para: DatePeriod now implements IteratorAggregate (instead of Traversable).

sect3.title: DOM
sect3.para: DOMNamedNodeMap and DOMNodeList now implement IteratorAggregate (instead of Traversable).

sect3.title: Intl
sect3.para: IntlBreakIterator and ResourceBundle now implement IteratorAggregate (instead of Traversable).

sect3.title: Enchant
sect3.para: The enchant extension now uses libenchant-2 by default when available. libenchant version 1 is still supported but is deprecated and could be removed in the future.

listitem.para: The num_points parameter of imagepolygon, imageopenpolygon and imagefilledpolygon is now optional, i.e. these functions may be called with either 3 or 4 arguments. If the argument is omitted, it is calculated as count($points)/2.
The function imagegetinterpolation to get the current interpolation method has been added.

sect3.title: JSON
sect3.para: The JSON extension cannot be disabled anymore and is always an integral part of any PHP build, similar to the date extension.

sect3.title: MBString
sect3.para: The Unicode data tables have been updated to version 13.0.0.

sect3.title: PDO
sect3.para: PDOStatement now implements IteratorAggregate (instead of Traversable).

sect3.title: LibXML
sect3.para: The minimum required libxml version is now 2.9.0. This means that external entity loading is now guaranteed to be disabled by default, and no extra steps need to be taken to protect against XXE attacks.

listitem.para: When mysqlnd is not used (which is the default and recommended option), the minimum supported libmysqlclient version is now 5.5.
mysqli_result now implements IteratorAggregate (instead of Traversable).

sect3.title: PGSQL / PDO PGSQL
sect3.para: The PGSQL and PDO PGSQL extensions now require at least libpq 9.1.

sect3.title: Readline
sect3.para: Calling readline_completion_function before the interactive prompt starts (e.g. in auto_prepend_file) will now override the default interactive prompt completion function. Previously, readline_completion_function only worked when called after starting the interactive prompt.

sect3.title: SimpleXML
sect3.para: SimpleXMLElement now implements RecursiveIterator and absorbed the functionality of SimpleXMLIterator. SimpleXMLIterator is an empty extension of SimpleXMLElement.

listitem.para: com.dotnet_version is a new INI directive to choose the version of the .NET framework to use for dotnet objects.
zend.exception_string_param_max_len is a new INI directive to set the maximum string length in an argument of a stringified stack strace.

sect2.title: EBCDIC
sect2.para: EBCDIC targets are no longer supported, though it's unlikely that they were still working in the first place.

listitem.para: A Just-In-Time (JIT) compiler has been added to the opcache extension.
array_slice on an array without gaps will no longer scan the whole array to find the start offset. This may significantly reduce the runtime of the function with large offsets and small lengths.
strtolower now uses a SIMD implementation when using the "C" LC_CTYPE locale (which is the default).
